name: The Rotting Tree
description:
Play as the Wolf's Maw, a hardened mercenary bound by magical contract to help in the quest to destroy the Rotting Tree, a thing out of myth.  The Rotting Tree is a mostly linear story set in the same universe as Rise of Etrea (though not in the same place).

The Characters

Elaith (they/them) - A shapeshifter of unique disposition and extreme wealth.  They are the one that bought your contract, and to them you are bound.

Audax (he/him)  - The warrior that stays at Elaith's side no matter what.  He is battle worn, gruff, and incredibly suspicious of you.  

Berka (she/her/)- A former 'colleague' of yours known for her explosive methods.  Though you know from experience she is more dangerous than her inventions.

Mirin (they/she/him) - A mage of great talent, and great dishonesty.  Much like you they have been forced into the dangerous mission of destroying the Rotting Tree.
